A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As much as it left me thinking about whether I liked it\, The Last Jedi gave me a good time. It always feels special watching a Star Wars movie and this new addition is worthy enough to be rated as one of the best. It won't go down the way you think. However\, it does go down very well excecuted.  The middle dragged slowly due a  specific boring storyline on a casino planet. But once the movie picks up its pace again\, you will be left with pure entertainment and emotional scenes with all of those beloved characters.
